unnormalised: Mumbai, India – Manufacturers across India are increasingly adopting sophisticated inventory forecasting techniques to optimize their supply chains and minimize disruptions, particularly around peak demand periods like Diwali and the upcoming Onam festivities. Accurate forecasting helps avoid stockouts of crucial components and raw materials, ensuring smooth production and timely delivery of finished goods.
